description: A ColumnDropperByIndex is a converter which drops columns from a dataset by an index, or a range of indexes.
error_msg: The parameters for ColumnDropperByIndex should include 'columns_index'.

oneOf.description: The index of the single column to drop.
oneOf.error_msg: The column index should be a non-negative integer representing the index of the column to be dropped.

columns_index.error_msg: The columns_index parameter should either be a single integer or a tuple of two integers.
